q: The management reshuffling appears to be amicable. Larry Page and Eric Schmidt had high praise for each other during a conference call with analysts, with Eric Schmidt describing Google's co-founders as his`` best friends.'' I believe Larry Page is ready to be chief executive, Eric Schmidt said during the call.`` It's time for him to have a shot at running this.'' leader. Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain an adviser to Larry Page and Google's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , as Google's executive chairman. The changes will be effective April 4. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come, Eric Schmidt said. Larry Page praised Eric Schmidt , too:`` There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly.''

CRM 2011, which will go head to head with other cloud-based CRM products from companies like Salesforce.com and Oracle.`` Sales professionals are at the heart of almost every successful business,'' said Steve Ballmer . Microsoft Dynamics CRM redefines productivity by offering an industry-leading product that is fully embracing the cloud. The things that make Microsoft Dynamics CRM an industry leader include giving sales professionals a familiar user experience, enabling greater collaboration, streamlining of processes and access to real-time data so they can improve their customers' experiences and effectively compete in the market. `` The service is available today as a cloud offering,'' he said.`` This is the first time we've made a release in the cloud before we have done so in the server version

prime minister said he was`` very sorry'' Mr Andy Coulson had decided to resign but he`` understood that the continuing pressures on him and his family meant that he felt compelled to do so''. Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government, he said. He denied that it raised questions about his own judgement and said Mr Andy Coulson had`` run the Downing Street press office in a professional and competent and good way''. The

Allen Iverson said he did not mind sitting out the final minutes of a blowout victory instead of attempting to set a career high. Honestly, and I can't be any truer than this, all I wanted was for the Milwaukee Buck Bucks to be down one point once there were all zeroes on the board, he said. The Sixers blew a 19-point, fourth-quarter lead in an overtime loss to New York on Friday night.
